019package com.plotsquared.bukkit.util.task;
020
021import com.plotsquared.core.util.task.PlotSquaredTask;
022import org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitRunnable;
023import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
024
025/**
026 * Bukkit implementation of {@link PlotSquaredTask}
027 */
028public final class BukkitPlotSquaredTask extends BukkitRunnable implements PlotSquaredTask {
029
030    @NonNull
031    private final Runnable runnable;
032
033    public BukkitPlotSquaredTask(final @NonNull Runnable runnable) {
034        this.runnable = runnable;
035    }
036
037    @Override
038    public void runTask() {
039        this.runnable.run();
040    }
041
042}
